Wisdom: الطَّاعَةُ تُنْجِي الْمَعْصِيَةُ تُرْدِي
enWisdom: Obedience saves and disobedience destroys

Wisdom: الطَّاعَةُ تَسْتَدِرُّ الْمَثُوبَةَ
enWisdom: Obedience brings forth [divine] reward

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَسْعَدَ النَّاسِ مَنْ كَانَ لَهُ مِنْ نَفْسِهِ بِطَاعَةِ اللَّهِ مُتَقَاضٍ
enWisdom: Verily the most felicitous of people is one who has an exhorter in himself [that urges him] to obey Allah

Wisdom: إِنَّ مَنْ بَذَلَ نَفْسَهُ فِي طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ كَانَتْ نَفْسُهُ نَاجِيَةً سَالِمَةً وَصَفْقَتُهُ رَابِحَةً غَانِمَةً
enWisdom: Whoever makes an effort to strive in obedience to Allah and His messenger, his soul shall be safe and sound [from the torments of the Hereafter] and his transaction will be profitable and gainful

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ إِنْ سَالَمْتَ اللَّهَ سَلِمْتَ وَفُزْتَ
enWisdom: Verily if you submit to Allah, you will be safe and successful

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ إِنْ أَطَعْتَ اللَّهَ نَجَّاكَ وَأَصْلَحَ مَثْوَاكَ
enWisdom: Verily if you obey Allah, He will save you and make your [final] abode good

Wisdom: بِالطَّاعَةِ يَكُونُ الْفَوْزُ
enWisdom: Through obedience there is success

Wisdom: بِالطَّاعَةِ تُزْلَفُ الْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
enWisdom: By obedience Paradise is brought closer for the pious

Wisdom: بَادِرِ الطَّاعَةَ تَسْعَدْ
enWisdom: Hasten towards obedience [to Allah] and you will be felicitous

Wisdom: بَادِرِ [بَاكِرِ] الطَّاعَةَ تَسْعَدْ
enWisdom: Hasten towards obedience [to Allah] and you will be felicitous

Wisdom: تَوَسَّلْ بِطَاعَةِ اللَّهِ تَنْجَحْ
enWisdom: Seek intercession through the obedience of Allah and you will succeed

Wisdom: ثَمَرَةُ الطَّاعَةِ الْجَنَّةُ
enWisdom: The fruit of obedience is Paradise

Wisdom: دَعُوا طَاعَةَ الْبَغْيِ وَالْعِنَادِ وَاسْلُكُوا سَبِيلَ الطَّاعَةِ وَالِانْقِيَادِ تَسْعَدُوا فِي الْمَعَادِ
enWisdom: Stop following [the path of] aggression and obduracy, and follow the path of obedience and submission [to Allah], [by this] you will be happy in the Hereafter

Wisdom: رَاكِبُ الطَّاعَةِ مَقِيلُهُ الْجَنَّةُ
enWisdom: Whoever embarks on [the ship of] obedience [to Allah], his port of call is Paradise

Wisdom: سَالِمِ اللَّهَ تَسْلَمْ أُخْرَاكَ
enWisdom: Submit to Allah and your Hereafter will be saved

Wisdom: ظِلُّ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مَبْذُولٌ لِمَنْ أَطَاعَهُ فِي الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: The shade of Allah, the Glorified, in the Hereafter is spread out for the one who obeys Him in this world

Wisdom: مَنْ يُطِعِ اللَّهَ يَفُزْ
enWisdom: One who obeys his Lord gains success

Wisdom: مَنْ أَطَاعَ اللَّهَ لَمْ يَشْقَ أَبَداً
enWisdom: One who obeys Allah will never become wretched

Wisdom: مَنِ اتَّخَذَ طَاعَةَ اللَّهِ سَبِيلًا فَازَ بِالَّتِي هِيَ أَعْظَمُ
enWisdom: One who follows the path of obedience to Allah attains something greater [than what he would get by following other paths]

Wisdom: نَالَ الْفَوْزَ مَنْ وُفِّقَ لِلطَّاعَةِ
enWisdom: He who has been granted success in obeying [and worshipping Allah] has [truly] gained success

Wisdom: وَقِّ نَفْسَكَ ناراً وَقُودُهَا النَّاسُ وَالْحِجارَةُ بِمُبَادَرَتِكَ إِلَى طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ وَتَجَنُّبِكَ مَعَاصِيَهُ وَتَوَخِّيكَ رِضَاهُ
enWisdom: Safeguard yourself from the fire whose fuel is men and stones by advancing towards obedience to Allah, eschewing His disobedience and seeking His pleasure

Wisdom: وَقُّوا أَنْفُسَكُمْ مِنْ عَذَابِ اللَّهِ بِالْمُبَادَرَةِ إِلَى طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: Protect yourselves from the chastisement of Allah by hastening towards obedience to Allah

Wisdom: لَا تُقْدِمْ وَلَا تُجْحِمْ إِلَّا عَلَى تَقْوَى اللَّهِ وَطَاعَتِهِ تَظْفَرْ بِالنُّجْحِ وَالنَّهْجِ الْقَوِيمِ
enWisdom: Neither [should you] advance nor retreat except with the fear of Allah and in obedience to Him, [in this way] you will become victorious by attaining success and [finding] the right way

Wisdom: لَا يَسْعَدُ امْرُؤٌ إِلَّا بِطَاعَةِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ وَلَا يَشْقَى امْرُؤٌ إِلَّا بِمَعْصِيَةِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: A person does not attain felicity except through the obedience of Allah, the Glorified, and a person does not become wretched except by disobeying Allah
